languages.text: Whenever {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g} is used, all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects immediately suffer an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from these effects.

traits.locale_text: When Carnival of Misery is used, all DoT effects on enemies immediately deal their damage.

Whenever Carnival of Misery is used, all enemies under any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} immediately suffer an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of these effects.

Whenever Carnival of Misery is used, all enemies under any damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} immediately suffer an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of these effects.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que se use {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnaval de miseria{/g}, todos los enemigos que sufran de cualquier efecto de daño continuado reciben de inmediato una aplicación del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de esos efectos.

languages.text: {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}慟哭のカーニバル{/g}が使用されるたび、継続ダメージを受けている敵すべて、即座にこれらの効果から追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g} is used, all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects immediately suffer an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from these effects.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}慟哭のカーニバル{/g}が使用されるたび、継続ダメージを受けている敵すべて、即座にこれらの効果から追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: 每当使用{g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}痛苦狂欢{/g}时，所有受到持续伤害效果影响的敌人会立刻受到这些效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g} is used, all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects immediately suffer an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from these effects.

traits.locale_text: 每当使用{g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}痛苦狂欢{/g}时，所有受到持续伤害效果影响的敌人会立刻受到这些效果造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Wird {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Fest der Qualen{/g} eingesetzt, erleiden alle mit Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten belegten Gegner sofort eine weitere Instanz {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch diese Effekte.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g} is used, all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects immediately suffer an additional instance of {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from these effects.

traits.locale_text: Wird {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Fest der Qualen{/g} eingesetzt, erleiden alle mit Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekten belegten Gegner sofort eine weitere Instanz {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch diese Effekte.

languages.text: Lors de l'utilisation de {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnaval de misère{/g}, les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs subissent immédiatement une instance supplémentaire de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de ces effets.

traits.locale_text: Lors de l'utilisation de {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnaval de misère{/g}, les ennemis souffrant d'effets de dégâts progressifs subissent immédiatement une instance supplémentaire de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de ces effets.

languages.text: Когда применяется {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Карнавал страданий{/g}, все противники, на которых действуют эффекты периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, немедленно получают внеочередной урон от этих эффектов.
